name: The Last Fox
description:
An art piece of a game concept experience stealth game about a Red Fox's first encounter with an ill-tempered cybernetic monstrosity(Boris the Bear) in a mysterious mountainous grove.

A two week project by two game designers students at Futuregames in Stockholm:

Robert Arnborg AKA Max Robert (That's me) - Level Design, 3D Blender Modeling, Cinematics and Full Orchestral Music Score

Fabian Adlertz Bertzén - Game Designer, AI, UI, Game Animation Implementation

Check out more of my music compositions for this game and more here:

https://maxrobert.newgrounds.com/
